MediumCharacteristic.description: Describes the contact medium characteristics that could be used to contact a party.

type.description: The type of phone number such as mobile, fixed home, fixed office,…

street1.description: Street description of a postal contact address

street2.description: Complementary street description of a postal contact address

postcode.description: Post code of a postal contact address

city.description: City of a postal contact address

stateOrProvince.description: State or Province of a postal contact address

country.description: . Country of a postal contact address

emailAddress.description: Full email address in standard format (e.g. fred.bloggs@thing.com)

phoneNumber.description: Phone number following the recommendations of the E164 international public communications numbering plan

socialNetworkId.description: Identifier as a member of a social network
